name: International Webinar on Materials Science and Engineering
content: Materials Science 2022 will witness an amalgamation of peerless speakers who enlighten the crowd with their knowledge and confabulate on various new-fangled topics related to the field of Materials Science and Engineering which welcomes all the participants from all over the world to join and attend the upcoming prestigious event Materials Science and Engineering, which is going to be held Online (Webinar), on July 29-30, 2022\. The conference will include Keynote presentations, Oral/Poster presentations. It is a broad audience gathering for exploring the advancement in Materials Science 2022, Join us online for Materials Science 2022 is to promote efficient and quality research and real-world impact in an atmosphere of true international cooperation between Material scientists, engineers and materials researchers by bringing together materials science experts, along with industrial CEO’s and heads to discuss the latest developments and innovations in the fields of Materials. many more Materials Science 2022 mainly focuses on the theme “Discussing Future Trends: Cutting-edge technologies, innovations in materials science and engineering” It mainly provides an important and various significant business meetings, scientific sessions and networking opportunities. For details and abstract submission follow: https://materialscience.scientificmeditech.com/ Track 1: Current Concepts in Materials Science Track 2: Bioinspired Materials and Systems Track 3: Dental Technology & Materials Science Track 4: Non-linear Optical Materials & Photonics Track 5: Microporous and Mesoporous Materials Track 6: Optical and Quantum Electronics Track 7: Carbon Nanostructures, Graphene and 2D Materials Track 8: Ceramics, Engineering Materials and Composite Materials Stroke Contact : materialsscience.edu@gmail.
